body: It doesnt matter, actually the mayor love of araragi always and for the centuries will be shinobu <3,and personaly i dont like senjouhara at all

I think that even Koyomi wouldn't want a girlfriend that has a dick...It would be fun to see him wanting to break up with her after discovering this shit and Senjougahara going all yandere on him with Hanekawa's help lol
